rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall featuring floor-to-ceiling windows that allow natural light. The area is designed with ample space for a coat closet and shoe storage, aligned with Vastu principles ensuring a welcoming energy.

A large living room with floor-to-ceiling windows that offer a panoramic view of the central courtyard. The design integrates natural light and ventilation following both modern aesthetics and traditional Vastu guidelines.

An open-concept kitchen adjacent to the living area, featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for ample sunlight. The placement is according to local building norms and Vastu principles, ensuring a positive flow of energy.
A dining area that flows into the living room, designed with modern aesthetics and floor-to-ceiling windows to enhance natural lighting, complementing the central courtyard view.

A private central courtyard acting as a serene focal point of the farmhouse design. This space is used for both relaxation and to integrate the indoor-outdoor living concept, in line with Vastu principles.

A dedicated private gym area integrated into the ground floor layout. The design includes functional equipment zones and ample space for movement, ensuring privacy while aligning with safety standards and local building norms.
A full bathroom with essential amenities designed to complement the living spaces. The layout is compact yet functional, ensuring ease of maintenance and adherence to local building codes.

openings.description: Floor-to-ceiling windows integrated throughout the living areas and kitchen to maximize natural light. These openings are strategically positioned for optimal ventilation and aesthetic appeal.
Main entrance door with a wide opening to allow smooth flow of positive energy as per Vastu principles, along with multiple access points connecting the interior rooms.
